content:
Hi Everyone,

We are trying to mapping CMS Prior Authorization(PA) request elements to claim resource.
As part of CMS PA request we needs to provide details about attending provider, referring provider, facility provider, ordering provider, service provider, operating provider.
Can we use careteam elements in claim resource for sending these details or do you suggest any other elements in claim resource

Thank you so much for the support

Not sure lloyd pinged me on this other than I did an X12 mapping to the Claim resource for Prior Authorizations. :) Yes, I would use the careTeam elements to describe the various provider details, if that was essential to understanding what is being asked for authorization. Otherwise only the party responsible for the claim would go in the provider element.
